name: bramble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a wild bush with thorns, that produces blackberries: We carefully pushed our way through the low brambles.
TorriPhoto/Moment/GettyImages
[ C ] UK a
blackberry : We stopped to pick brambles by the side of the road. bramble jam
kaanates/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C ] US any wild bush with thorns
